name: starship
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
especially in stories, a large vehicle used for travelling in space, outside our solar system (= our sun and the group of planets that move around it): He plays a lone explorer whose starship crashes on an unknown planet. She's currently filming a new sci-fi series in which she plays a starship captain.
More examplesFewer examplesThe game allows you to take control of your own starship. They are in the only escape pod that ejected from the starship.The book follows a series of adventures that begin with him hiding aboard a starship.
